prompt:
Please describe a real-life situation in which someone has helped you make progress on your goal and how this person assisted you.
A friend of mine, who is very knowledgeable about art history and theory, helped me a lot with my research on the Baroque period. She provided me with valuable resources, such as academic papers, books, and online courses. Moreover, she gave me insightful advice on how to structure my arguments and what questions I should ask in order to deepen my understanding of the topic at hand. Thanks to her assistance, I could make significant progress in my research project and write a well-founded paper on this subject matter.
